articles.description: Scientists are uncovering how GLP-1 drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy act on brain regions that control hunger, nausea, pleasure-based eating, and thirst. These discoveries may help create treatments that keep the benefits of weight loss while reducing unwanted side effects.

articles.title: Fugitive wanted for murder in India caught trying to sneak into Canada from U.S.
articles.description: Vishat Kumar's true identity was allegedly discovered on a secondary inspection through the use of biometrics when he attempted to enter from Buffalo. N.Y.

articles.title: Supercomputer creates the most realistic virtual brain ever
articles.description: Researchers have created one of the most detailed virtual mouse cortex simulations ever achieved by combining massive biological datasets with the extraordinary power of Japan’s Fugaku supercomputer. The digital brain behaves like a living system, complete with millions of neurons and tens of billio

articles.title: Alberta invokes notwithstanding clause to stop court challenges of transgender laws
articles.description: The clause relates to laws that put restrictions on student pronoun changes at school, on girls' sports, and on medical therapies for young people looking to transition.

articles.title: Lebanon says Israeli strike killed 13 people near Palestinian refugee camp
articles.description: The Israeli military says it targeted Hamas members "operating in a training compound", which Hamas rejected as "fabrication and lies".

articles.title: John Main selected as Nunavut’s first non-Inuk leader
articles.description: John Main was selected as Nunavut’s next premier on Tuesday, marking the first time Nunavut... The post John Main selected as Nunavut’s first non-Inuk leader appeared first on APTN News.

articles.title: Alberta’s plan to let doctors work publicly and privately worries critics, health-care advocates
articles.description: The Canadian Medical Association, which represents doctors nationwide, says Albertans will be left waiting longer to access health care if the province moves forward with the plan.

articles.title: Secret chemical traces reveal life on Earth 3. 3 billion years ago
articles.description: Researchers have discovered chemical traces of life in rocks older than 3.3 billion years, offering a rare look at Earth’s earliest biology. By combining advanced chemical methods with artificial intelligence, scientists were able to detect faint molecular patterns left behind long after the origina

articles.title: Canadian-led Quilt brings its smart heat pumps north
articles.description: After launching in 14 US states, Quilt systems are now available in five Canadian provinces. The post Canadian-led Quilt brings its smart heat pumps north first appeared on BetaKit.

articles.title: As DEI backlash spills into Canada, Black tech leaders envision a more sustainable model
articles.description: Advocates say tech industry should focus on cross-initiatives, community, and access to capital. The post As DEI backlash spills into Canada, Black tech leaders envision a more sustainable model first appeared on BetaKit.

articles.title: PWHL says Ottawa Charge will not play at new Lansdowne 2.0 arena
articles.description: The Professional Women's Hockey League says it is discussing alternatives to the 5,850 seat arena approved as part of the Lansdowne 2.0 redevelopment plan.

articles.title: Ottawa Senators starting to hit their stride as 20-game mark approaches
articles.description: The Senators prepare to face the Anaheim Ducks on Thursday night to start a seven-game, two-week-long road trip

articles.title: The size of the federal bureaucracy jumped 9% last year, documents say
articles.description: The new public accounts disclosures tabled recently in the House of Commons show that Ottawa added 99,000 additional public servants between 2015-16 and 2024-25

articles.title: Plooto co-founder sues payment software firm, accuses board of ousting him
articles.description: Serguei Kloubkov alleges he was pushed out after nominating former CEO Hamed Abbasi to board. The post Plooto co-founder sues payment software firm, accuses board of ousting him first appeared on BetaKit.

articles.title: Christian group sues Quebec City for cancelling show by U.S. singer Sean Feucht
articles.description: Sean Feucht's planned tour of eastern Canada saw all six venues cancel permits or otherwise turn him away, often citing public safety or security concerns

articles.title: Ottawa Senators' Nick Cousins fined by NHL for embellishment
articles.description: Veteran winger hit with $2,000 fine for incident during game against the Utah Mammoth on Nov. 9. Read more.

articles.title: Public service workers to be notified about layoffs 'shortly,' says union
articles.description: PSAC held a lobby day on Nov. 18 to tell parliamentarians the government's planned cuts "will make life harder, not easier."

articles.title: Housing starts declined 17% in October, CMHC says
articles.description: The annualized rate of housing starts fell 17 per cent in October compared with September, the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation says.
